summary: A fully equipped 100% lore friendly home with a quest
descriptionHtml:
==================================== Ravenhall v2.0===========================================
check the videos tab for a walk round  and overview of some of the features, and as always please leave me some feedback in the comments . What you like, what you don\'t or just what you would like to see in ravenhall. I always try to answer every comment and add features that you guys want

===================================Updating from v1.1?=======================================
1/ be shure to remove all your items from Ravenhall
2/ uninstall v1.1
3/ create a clean save (a save without the mod)
4/ install v2.0
(you dont need to play the whole quest again. just run strait to where you met The Raven and read his note. this will now auto complete the quest)
CHANGELOG; 
New to v2.0.
*Dragon claw Display
*an extra floor to the armory with more mannequins and weapon racks
*shooting range
*FIX missing texture bug
*better decoration throughout
*FOLLOWER FRIENDLY!!!!!!!
*many more improvements

====================================What is Ravenhall?========================================

Ravenhall is a lore friendly, medium sized home with everything you could need and a short quest to gain the key. Raenhall belongs to an assassin known as \"The Raven\" who has been n the run in tamriel for years. 

======================================REQUIREMENTS========================================
-Hearthfires DLC
-Dawnguard DLC
-Latest Skyrim update.ESM
========================================FEATURES:===========================================
-large main hall with alchemy garden
-full alchemy & enchanting facilitys
-full smithing facility
-full kitchen with a bar, large dining table, cooking pot, oven, interactive mead barrels and a HUGE spit
-bedroom with attached dressing room
-HUGE armory behind a hidden door
-\"The Raven\'s Armor\" sword and bow hidden behind a false panel
-private study with interactive bookshelves also with hidden entrance
-large Bathroom
-lots of custom containers
-interactive dragon preist mask display
-auto-sorting

===========================================THE QUEST=======================================
I will leave this one up to you. but be warned, this is NOT an easy place to find on your own. Try starting at dragonsreach in Whiterun. Head upstairs and look for a note near the door to the dragon room. If you still have no luck. theck the video tab on this page for the location of the enterance
=============================================BUGS==========================================
Only one, Orcish battleaxes don\'t like weapon racks. i have tryed every trick in the book, and some that arn\'t! but that one weapon still sits funny.
if you find anything else please tell me and i will fix it ASAP
===========================================UPDATES=========================================
I will be maintaining this mod and updating overtime. as of now i am looking for someone who is willing to create a set of armor, bow and sword for this mod so if that\'s you please PM me!
author: MickynVts
